module.name: Antwerp I/O module
module.description: This VSCP module has 28 outputs, 3 opto isolated inputs, 4 0-10V outputs

reg.name: Zone
reg.description: Zone this module belongs to

reg.name: Subzone
reg.description: Subzone this module belongs to

reg.name: output 1 status register
reg.description:
Writing a value to the output control register will activate/deactivate the output output.
 0 - The output is not active.
 1 - The output is active.

reg.name: Control byte for output 1
reg.description:
The output control bits enable/disable output associated functionality:
 Bit 0 - Reserved.
 Bit 1 - If set: Alarm sent when protection timer triggers.
 Bit 2 - Protection timer enable.
 Bit 3 - Send On event when relay goes to active state.
 Bit 4 - Send Off event when relay goes to inactive state.
 Bit 5 - Reserved.
 Bit 6 - Reserved.
 Bit 7 - If set to one the relay is enabled.

reg.name: Subzone for output 1
reg.description: This is a subzone related to this specific output. If zero the the module Zone/subzone will be used else the modules zone and the outputs sub zone will be used.

reg.name: PWM1 value
reg.description: The actual value of the PWM output.

reg.name: PWM2 value
reg.description: The actual value of the PWM output.

reg.name: PWM3 value
reg.description: The actual value of the PWM output.

reg.name: PWM4 value
reg.description: The actual value of the PWM output.

reg.name: Control byte for PWM1
reg.description:
The control bits enable/disable PWM associated functionality:
 Bit 0 - Reserved.
 Bit 1 - Reserved
 Bit 2 - Protection timer enable for associated output.
 Bit 3 - Send On event when PWM goes to active state (above treshold).
 Bit 4 - Send Off event when PWM goes to inactive state (below treshold).
 Bit 5 - Reserved.
 Bit 6 - Reserved.
 Bit 7 - If set to one the PWM is enabled.

reg.name: Control byte for PWM2
reg.description:
The control bits enable/disable PWM associated functionality:
 Bit 0 - Reserved.
 Bit 1 - Reserved
 Bit 2 - Protection timer enable for associated output.
 Bit 3 - Send On event when PWM goes to active state (above treshold).
 Bit 4 - Send Off event when PWM goes to inactive state (below treshold).
 Bit 5 - Reserved.
 Bit 6 - Reserved.
 Bit 7 - If set to one the PWM is enabled.

reg.description:

 Bit 4 - Send Off event when PWM goes to inactive state (below treshold).
 Bit 5 - Reserved.
 Bit 6 - Reserved.
 Bit 7 - If set to one the PWM is enabled.

reg.name: With PWM1 associated Output
reg.description: Output associated with PWM will be activated if above PWM treshold value\nOutput will be deactivate when beloz treshold

reg.name: With PWM2 associated Output
reg.description: Output associated with PWM will be activated if above PWM treshold value\nOutput will be deactivate when beloz treshold

reg.name: With PWM3 associated Output
reg.description: Output associated with PWM will be activated if above PWM treshold value\nOutput will be deactivate when beloz treshold

reg.name: With PWM4 associated Output
reg.description: Output associated with PWM will be activated if above PWM treshold value\nOutput will be deactivate when beloz treshold

reg.name: Treshhold PWM1
reg.description: Treshold value for associated outputs (if any) with PWM1

reg.name: Treshhold PWM2
reg.description: Treshold value for associated outputs (if any) with PWM1

reg.name: Treshhold PWM3
reg.description: Treshold value for associated outputs (if any) with PWM1

reg.name: Treshhold PWM4
reg.description: Treshold value for associated outputs (if any) with PWM1

action.name: Increase matching PWM output(s) with argument
